title: Castor and Pollux: a tale of two spiritual brothers
creator_credit: Phil Noyce, Tom Manefield and AFTRS
brief_description: A sometimes humorous, sometimes serious examination of the lifestyles of two middle-aged men in a revolt against conventional living. One is a bikie and the other a hippy.
